summary: Edited Redoran architectures meshes. One main room, two sets of stairwell ends, one extended hallway and one extended alcove.
descriptionHtml:
The standard tileset for Redoran architecture in Dragonborn was *very* sparse. This resource hopefully adds to the possibilities. It's still all in the bug hut theme, which I'm lukewarm about. This is a resource only. You'll have to add the meshes in via the CK. Requires legal copies of Skyrim and Dragonborn DLC (see permissions tab).

- One large room with a standard interior exit on either end.
- One alcove extended about 25%, making it more fit for a small bedroom than the standard alcove.
- One extended length hallway. Maybe not much use, but I had to create it anyway to get one of the stairwell pieces working.
- Two sets of stairwell exits/entrances. One is in a hallway with exits at either end of the hallway. The other is in an enclosed room. The enclosed version will work with 128 grid snaps, but you'll have to use 8 grid snaps to get the stairwell to fit it.

All of the tiles fit 128 grid snaps except as noted above. In my testing there is probably a little bit of seam visible in the large room, but only if you're nitpicky.

Editing was all done in Nifskope and collision added with Chunkmerge function of Nifutils. All hail that team of developers.
author: anothersunday
